item.title: US equal opportunity commission demands 20 law firms disclose DEI employment practices
item.description: The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is requesting data from 20 law firms about employment practices on diversity, equity and inclusion.

item.title: Trump says he'll speak with Putin in call to push for truce in Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin will speak Tuesday about how to finally end the devastating three-year war in Ukraine
